Curator's comments: Published: PM II (2): p.478 D. Symons in: Man's Best Friend, Birmingham 1991, p. 12 [5].

Published: The Temple in Ancient Egypt: New discoveries and recent research Edited by S. Quirke Published by BM Press 1997 ( Plate 27, Fig A and B) to accompany article by Betsy M Bryan The statue program for the mortuary temple of Amenhotep III (page 57- 80)
